commercialsystem.422.message: Commercials can only be run on partnered channels, once per 8 minutes, when the stream is live, for one of the following lengths: 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180

commercialsystem.autotimer.bad-parm.message: Failed to set autotimer. Interval must be at least 8 minutes and length must be one of: 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180

commercialsystem.autotimer.msg-del.message: No longer sending a message when an auto commercial starts

commercialsystem.autotimer.msg-set.message: Changed the message sent when an auto commercial starts to: $1

commercialsystem.autotimer.status-off.message: Commercial autotimer is off. To enable: !commercial autotimer (interval_mins:8 or greater) (length_secs:30,60,90,120,150,180) [message]

commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on.message: Commercial autotimer is on. $1 seconds of ads every $2 minutes. To disable: !commercial autotimer off --or-- To add/change a message: !commercial autotimer message (message) --or-- To remove message: !commercial autotimer nomessage

commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on-msg.message: The message sent when an auto commercial starts: $1

commercialsystem.autotimer.status-on-nom.message: No message is sent when an auto commercial starts
